name: Online Basketball Challenge 3D
description:
Challenge players from all over the world!

Swipe the ball to shoot and make the best score.

Challenge yourself and your friend with addictive basketball game.

Suitable for all ages and enjoy it on iPhone, iPad and iPod touch.

Have fun !

■Game center support:
Compare your best top score with others in the world.

■Social sharing:
Share your new score and challenge with your friends.
